data.title: Abandoned Lines and Stations
data.meta_description: A close up study of the Wilkinson and Jarvis small pavilion bulding at Corpusty and Saxthorpe, which was  located between Melton Constable and Aylsham on the line to Yarmouth Beach. ( Midland and Great Northern Joint Railway)  The building is on the Up platform which is also still fully extanct.  It is used as a local community amenity. All traces of the down platform have been erased. Melton Constable is to the right.  Facebook group for the local preservation volunteers.  https://www.facebook.com/groups/1028444864681053  Alan Moore  18th July 2023
